entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023
